results.name: Lower triangular matrix T, read by rows, such that row (n) is formed from the sums of adjacent terms in row (n-1) of the matrix square T^2, with T(0,0)=1.
comment: Column 0 forms the number of tournament sequences (A008934). Column 1 forms A097711. Row sums form A093657. This triangle has the same row sums and first column terms as in rows 2^n, for n>=0, of triangle A093654.
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..495, of rows 0..30 of triangle in flattened form.
formula: T(n, k) = T^2(n-1, k-1) + T^2(n-1, k) for n>=1 and k>1, with T(n, 1) = T^2(n-1, 1) and T(n,n) = 1 for n>=0, where T^2 is the matrix square of this triangle T.
